column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute ranks up there with the Louve and the Met as one of the finest museums in the world. With a steller collection of paintings by Monet and Van Gogh
column2: the museum has a breathtaking lineup of impressionist works. It houses George Seurat's famous "A Sunday on La Grande Jatte" as well as some amazing stuff from Asia
column3: just to scratch the surface. Make sure you check out the ancient armor
column4: swords and guns in the basement. It used to keep me occupied for hours when I was younger.
